attributes.action: Make 'Talk Like a Pirate Day' a National Holiday and give away free peg legs to those in need on this day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 'Talk Like a Pirate Day' is an underacknowledged event. More should be done to recognise this glorious event. To that end I propose that the day (September 19) be made a national holiday and peg legs to be given away freely to make pirate costumes easier to create.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
